code: import{IonContent,IonIcon,IonImg,IonItem,IonLabel,IonList,IonListHeader,IonMenu,IonMenuToggle}from'@ionic/react';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{paperPlaneOutline,paperPlaneSharp,peopleOutline,peopleSharp}from'ionicons/icons';import'./Menu.css';import LogoImg from'../images/logo_size.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var appPages=[{title:'Clientes',url:'/page/customers',iosIcon:peopleOutline,mdIcon:peopleSharp},{title:'Empleados',url:'/page/employees',iosIcon:paperPlaneOutline,mdIcon:paperPlaneSharp},{title:'Proveedores',url:'/page/suppliers',iosIcon:peopleOutline,mdIcon:peopleSharp}];var Menu=function Menu(){var location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonMenu,{contentId:"main",type:"overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonContent,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonList,{id:"inbox-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonListHeader,{color:"blue",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonImg,{src:LogoImg})}),appPages.map(function(appPage,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonMenuToggle,{autoHide:false,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(IonItem,{className:location.pathname===appPage.url?'selected':'',routerLink:appPage.url,routerDirection:"none",lines:"none",detail:false,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonIcon,{slot:"start",ios:appPage.iosIcon,md:appPage.mdIcon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IonLabel,{children:appPage.title})]})},index);})]})})});};export default Menu;
